title: When I use c++ API,there cuda error "out of memory" ,my gpu is 8G
body_html: when I use GPU do forward in c++ API ,there is cuda error : out of memory . I find that when I test one image .It use almost 2T GPU memory . I don't know why ,may be there grad is enable. When I use python there is no error. How can I reduce the use of GPU.
